title: Free Agency Frenzy Begins: Winners & Losers for Hopkins/Diggs/Buckner trades, Amari Cooper deal, Dak Prescott tag (Football 3/17)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Ryan Wilson, John Breech and Sean Wagner-McGough to react to an absolutely wild Monday in the NFL. First, the guys address late breaking reports of Amari Cooper re-signing with the Dallas Cowboys (5:35) and the Bills acquiring Stefon Diggs via trade with the Vikings (10:35). Next, the guys assess winners & losers for all the trades that occurred on Monday (19:45), with a heavy focus on the Texans dealing away DeAndre Hopkins to the Cardinals, but without forgetting DeForest Buckner going from the 49ers to the Colts and the Falcons getting Hayden Hurst from the Ravens. The Pick Six Superfriends then issue more winners & losers for signings that took place (43:45), including a look a flurry of moves from the Dolphins and Browns. Finally, Will, Ryan, John and Sean offer analysis of the tags that were applied at the deadline (1:21:00), discussing who used them wisely and who did not.
'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Castbox, Bullhorn and wherever else you listen to podcasts. 
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @ryanwilsonCBS @johnbreech, @seanjwagner
Check out the Pick Six Instagram page https://www.instagram.com/picksixpod/?hl=en
Join our Facebook group https://www.facebook.com/groups/758548147935545/
For more NFL coverage from CBS Sports, visit https://www.cbssports.com/nfl/
To hear more from the CBS Sports Podcast Network, visit https://www.cbssports.com/podcasts/

itunes:subtitle: Monday proved to be one of the wildest days in recent NFL memory. The Pick Six Superfriends are here to break down all the deals in this 2020 Free Agency Day 1 Recap
